thread.title: Rush hour delays on key city route
thread.title_full: Rush hour delays on key city route

title: Rush hour delays on key city route
text:
Gas works are causing delays for drivers entering Southampton via Bassett Avenue Rush hour delays on key city route 
DRIVERS are facing delays towards Southampton this morning due to roadworks. 
Gas works on Winchester Road at the Hill Lane roundabout are causing delays on Bassett Avenue. 
And traffic is backed up all the way to the M3. 
Gas works are causing delays for drivers entering Southampton via Bassett Avenue Sorry, an error occurred.
